recipes.title: Savory French Toast Sticks
recipes.description: Savory French Toast Sticks made with bread, eggs, milk and grated cheese. Perfect for breakfast.
steps: Cut bread into sticks.
Whisk eggs with milk, cheese, salt, pepper, and chili.
Dip sticks and fry until golden on each side.
Serve warm with grated cheese sprickled on it.

stepFlow.text: Whisk eggs, milk, cheese and spices.
Fry until golden on each side.

notes.defaultTip: Use slightly stale bread for better texture.

leftovers.storage: Store in fridge in airtight container

recipes.title: Plantain Nachos
recipes.description: Crispy plantain nachos made with ripe plantains, melted cheese, and fresh toppings. A perfect snack or party appetizer with a savory crunch.
ingredients: Sour cream or yogurt for topping
steps: Slice the plantains thinly and toss with olive oil and salt.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes until crispy.
Remove from oven and top with shredded cheese and diced toppings.
Bake for 5 more minutes until the cheese melts.
Serve warm with a dollop of sour cream or yogurt.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Apple Nachos
steps: Cut apples into thin slices.
Layer apple slices on a plate.
Melt peanut butter and drizzle it on the layered apples.
Add the chocolate drizzle as well and sprickle the granola or crushed nuts.

recipes.title: Spicy Peanut Butter Popcorn
recipes.description: Spicy Peanut Butter Popcorn made with popcorn, peanut butter and honey. Perfect for movie nights and small snacks.
steps: Melt peanut butter, honey, and chili powder in a pot under low heat.
Pour over already cooked popcorn and mix evenly.
Let cool slightly before serving.

recipes.title: Instant Ramen Taco
recipes.description: Instant Ramen Taco made with instant noodles, egg, lettuce and shredded cheese. Perfect for breakfast and tasty snacks.
ingredients: Lettuce, shredded chicken, spicy mayo(for filling)
steps: Cook noodles slightly, then mix with beaten egg.
Shape into small taco shells using foil molds.
Fry until crispy and golden.
Fill with your choice of toppings.

recipes.title: Spicy Corn & Coconut Bites
recipes.description: Spicy Corn & Coconut Bites made with Sweet corn, Grated coconut, Lime juice and Chili flakes. Perfect for instant and tasty snacks.
steps: Mix corn, coconut, chili flakes, and salt in a bowl.
Squeeze lime juice into the mixture and mix.
Form the mixture into small balls and chill for 10min before serving.

recipes.title: Plantain Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.description: Plantain Cinnamon Rolls made with ripe plantain, ground cinnamon and butter. Perfect for appetizers.
steps: Peel the plantain and slice it lengthwise into very thin, flat strips.
Lightly bake the strips in a little butter for 3 minutes until soft and flexible (not crispy).
Mix sugar (or honey) with cinnamon in a small bowl.
Spread a thin layer of the cinnamon mix over each warm plantain strip.
Gently roll each strip like a cinnamon roll and secure with a toothpick(s) or skewer(s) if needed.
Let cool slightly and enjoy warm!

recipes.title: Plantain Egg Cups
recipes.description: Plantain Egg Cups made with ripe plantain, egg and salt. Perfect for breakfast.
steps: Preheat your oven for 10 minutes to 180°C (350°F).
Slice the plantain into thin rounds.
Lightly grease muffin cups with oil and press the plantain slices into the bottom to form a base.
Crack an egg into each muffin cup over the plantain base.
Sprinkle a pinch of salt and pepper on each.
Bake for 12–15 minutes, or until the eggs are set to your liking.
Let them cool slightly before carefully removing from the muffin tin.

recipes.title: Choco Chili Banana Chips
recipes.description: Choco Chili Banana Chips made with ripe plantain, dark chocolate and chili powder. A perfect snack or party appetizer with a savory crunch.
steps: Thinly slice plantains and bake or fry until crisp.
Dip half side of the baked(or fried) plantain in melted chocolate.
Sprinkle with chili powder and salt.
Let it set and enjoy.

recipes.title: Nutty Date Energy Rocks
recipes.description: Nutty Date Energy Rocks are perfect for a quick, natural energy boost before workouts or during busy days. They also make a healthy, guilt-free snack that satisfies sweet cravings without refined sugar.
steps: Blend all ingredients into a sticky dough.
Roll into small rock-shaped balls.
Chill for 12 minutes and serve as an energy-packed snack.

recipes.title: sweet Potato Bites With Yogurt Dip
recipes.description: This is a very tasty snack. It can be taken as appetizer or just a quick snack.
ingredients: Greek yogurt(or available yogurt you can get) + lemon juice for dip
steps: Cut sweet potatoes into small cubes , toss with oil cinnamon ,paprika, and salt.
Bake at 180°c(356°F) for 20 mins.
Mix yogurt with a splash of lemon juice.
Serve the yogurt as a dip with baked potatoes.

recipes.title: Cheesy Ramen Nests
recipes.description: Cheesy ramen nest is a perfect dish for breakfast or lunch with its sponge-like texture and flavour-rich taste.
steps: Boil noodles without seasoning for 2 minutes.
Drain with a sieve and mix with egg ,cheese , and pepper.
Spoon into muffins tins and bake at 180°C for 14 mins until golden.

recipes.title: Banana Oat Energy Bites
recipes.description: Banana oat energy bites are quick no-bake snacks made from mashed bananas and oats that deliver steady energy. They’re perfect for school, workouts, or busy days when you need something healthy and satisfying.
steps: Mash banana and mix with oats, peanut butter, and chips.
Roll into small balls.
Chill for 30 minutes in fridge befor serving

recipes.title: Zesty Cucumber Chips
steps: Slice cucumber thinly and lay on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle paprika + salt.
Bake at 120°C(250°F) for 6o minutes until crisp.

recipes.title: Frozen Banana S`more Bites
steps: Cut bananas into thick slices.
Dip banana slices into chocolate.
Press into graham cracker crumbs and top with marshmellows.
Freeze for 30 minutes until set.

recipes.title: Avocado Egg Toast Cups
steps: Press bread slices into a greased muffin tin to form cups.
Crack an egg into each.
Bake at 180°C(360°F) for 15 minutes.
Top with mashed avocado and chili flakes.

recipes.title: Crispy Chickpea Snack
ingredients: Smoked paprika, garlic powder and salt
steps: Rinse and dry chickpeas.
Toss in a bowl with oil and spices.
Bake at 200°C (400°F) for 30 mins until crispy.

innerLink.name: sweet Potato Bites With Yogurt Dip

recipes.title: Mini Caprese Skewers
steps: Skewer one tomato, one mozarrella ,and a basil leaf onto toothpicks.
Season with black pepper or any season of your choice.

recipes.title: Cheesy Mango Poppers
steps: Cut mango into cubes.
Freeze mango cubes for 30 minutes.
Wrap each cube with a thin layer of cream cheese.
Roll in crushed nachos or cornflakes.
Serve chilled with toothpicks

recipes.title: Garri cookies
steps: In a bowl , cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
Add garri and mix well until it forms a soft dough.
Roll into small balls , flatten slightly, and place on a greased baking tray.
Bake at 180°(350F) for about 15 minutes or unti golden brown.
Let them cool and enjoy!

recipes.title: Rice & Yogurt Bowl
recipes.description: A cool, creamy bowl of rice mixed with yogurt, cucumber, and mint — refreshing, light, and probiotic-rich.
steps: Add cooked and cooled rice to a bowl.
Stir in plain yogurt until evenly coated.
Mix in chopped cucumber, mint, and a pinch of salt.
Serve chilled.
